name: Shadow Hunter Hatchling
senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The shadow hunter has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow hunter can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage and 10 (3d6) poison damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour.
